EmailTemplate.name: Accelerate_Cloud_Migration.Accelerate_Cloud_Migration_Nurture_3_Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: How are you keeping your cloud migration on track?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/3-22-2018-cloud-migration-webinar]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Many enterprises that migrate to the cloud struggle not only to meet their migration project deadlines but also to assure performance and minimize risk after the migration wraps up.
Where is your organization in its cloud journey? What should you be doing today to accelerate and de-risk your cloud migration? We answer these questions, as well as others, in this webinar <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/3-22-2018-cloud-migration-webinar]]>:
<[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/3-22-2018-cloud-migration-webinar]]>
Minimize risk and keep your cloud migration timeline on track. Watch this webinar <[[https://resources.turbonomic.com/accelerate-cloud-migration-projects/3-22-2018-cloud-migration-webinar]]> to learn more about how to accelerate and de-risk your cloud migration. Regards, Team Turbonomic
